column5: Thank God Canada  never let this guy move to the country He'd ruin the Gene Pool  How many leaves are you raking now Tweety Thats a skirt and not a kilt your weary laddy  Now you know why I have part time long distance occasional pretend friends Oh and I have 1 part time full time friend and 2 dogs
I kinda like Pete Frampton. That wasn't one of his best album covers though.
Whats amatter Mark no fishE pictures to post???? I kind of like the Frampton look on one of our nations treasures. I hope you alls seasons are going well.   Art

You wouldn't have to worry about a gene pool. No woman in their right mind would be with a guy wearing a skirt.  I believe ladies think the pink hat is sexy though.  You're just jealous Thorpe ... you want a pink hat - and you know you do.  If you're nice, I'll bring along one of Brian's new CD's (just released) and a pink hat for you.
Love is in the air.....
Yikes  Careful there Roy ... some things aren't funny.  (Best wishes friend)  Say, how come we never see any pics of Roy wearing kilts or anything like that? Have I missed something?  Pete
they do not make skirts for Midgets Pete  Roy is off the hook
Ah, never thought of that. Good point
CSI : Ontario edition
Marc enough is enough put on  a kilt take a pic post us a report Laddy.  American distraction but no canadian fish pic action  Just one pic...............  MTP

ah Art and mike,I kinna like leaving folks in the rafters Fishies are happy,me's been smilling ,guests well thems been working ,not so smiley Reel fatser  Laddy,not to be worried,the kilt shall come out   Lets just say pete you can keep that pinky hat,in a polite manner,I'd see ya on a float ahead of the parade,were you in TO a couple of weeks ago seems as if the bus had arrived eh it blew like a bus load  fairies for days on end
The "kilt will come out" ...  Another scary modern-day midget mystery
Thanks Pete. Remind me the next time you're up here to whack you in the shins.  Jamie, nice T-shirt. Is it your Mom's?
When did Gene get a pool? And why was I never invited.
Paul, for Pete's sake, if you have a kilt, you're invited to Marc's pool.
Green or red kilt. I don't want too clash.
Roy-more like a kiddy pool.Its the short-crotch thing,he can't get out of the bigboy pools.
Pic of Thorpe's pool
Just the kind of pool Roy likes .Its not over his head
Tee Hee ... love the short crotch pool system there.  (Hey Roy - I've got shin guards.)
Yes they do make skirts for "Dwarfs", I happen to be one and I own three. Yellow, red and green. !!!
